titles: An elegie and epitapth [sic], upon the Right Honourable the Lord Francis Villars: written by an affectionate servant to his family, kinsman to his person, and prisoner for the same caus this noble lord so bravely dyed in.
notes: Verse - "What are the crying sins of this our State,".
Woodcut mememto mori at head of verse.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Villiers, Francis, 1629-1648 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
